entries.title: Residential Waste Pickup
entries.paragraph: GCI's curbside trash and recycling pickup is the best choice for your home, and for the environment.

entries.title: Business Waste Pickup
entries.paragraph: Take care of business, we'll take care of the waste. Chose GCI for reliable, responsible business waste pickup.

entries.title: Roll-Off Dumpster Rental
entries.paragraph: From quick cleanouts to major renovations, GCI has a dumpster that's perfect for your project.
